history.proof: intros u_ex v_ex prod_ex. destruct u_ex as [lu Hu]. destruct v_ex as [lv Hv]. exists (Rbar_mult lu lv). apply is_lim_seq_mult with lu lv. - apply Hu. - apply Hv. - apply VarMap.find. + hfcrush use: is_lim_seq_unique, Rbar_mult_correct. + hauto l: on depth: 3. + hauto l: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: The reference Hprod was not found in the current environment.

original: intros u_ex v_ex prod_ex. destruct u_ex as [lu Hu]. destruct v_ex as [lv Hv]. destruct prod_ex as [prodlim Hprod]. exists (Rbar_mult lu lv). apply is_lim_seq_mult with lu lv. - apply Hu. - apply Hv. - apply Hprod.
